snippet: The Bank of England released emails on Friday detailing conversations about the setting of key interest rates in 2008 with Timothy F. Geithner when he ran the Federal Reserve Bank of New York.
abstract: The Bank of England released emails on Friday detailing conversations about the setting of key interest rates in 2008 with Timothy F. Geithner when he ran the Federal Reserve Bank of New York.

headline.main: Bank of England Supported Geithner's Rate Advice
